org.sd.text
Interface WordGramSplitter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWordGramSplitter, AsianWordGramSplitter, CapitalizedPhraseSplitter, DefaultWordGramSplitter
public interface WordGramSplitter

Utility to split a string into N-word grams.

Author:
Spence Koehler

findWordGram

int[] findWordGram(java.lang.String wordGram,
                   java.lang.String text)
Find the (first intance of the normalized) wordGram in the (original) text.

Note that if this splitter uses normalizations to compute wordGrams, then the same normalizations will need to be applied to the text in order to find the wordGram within.

Returns:
the wordGram's start (inclusive) and end (exclusive) positions in the text or null if not present.
